name: Cursed Morning
description:
THE CURSE OF SNOOZING YOUR ALARM CLOCK

You get a few more minutes of sleep, but you pay by having less time for a peaceful morning.

This is a small game about trying to get a few more minutes of sleep. You play by running through procedurally generated dreams, reacting to quick time events to not wake up.
If you do wake up, there's one last resort: Snooze the alarm! But this devilish clock will only allow you to press snooze three times...

The game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #54.
